attributes.action: Build the cancelled platforms 15/16 at Manchester Piccadilly.
attributes.additional_details:
Manchester Piccadilly platforms 13/14 and the Castlefield Corridor, including Deansgate and Oxford Road stations have been officially classed as 'congested' by Network Rail. Delays at these platforms ripple across the entire region. Plans to relieve this congestion were drawn up, then shelved by the previous government. 
Further reading:
MEN Article - https://bit.ly/2PNVohn
TFN Board Meeting - https://bit.ly/3czG15F
Another plucky activist - https://twitter.com/PiccPlatforms
attributes.background: Work to build Manchester Piccadilly platforms 15/16 and associated Castlefield Corridor Improvements should begin immediately to help relieve severe congestion on the line.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Network Rail and individual train companies are responsible for station improvements.

You could start a petition calling for the UK Government to provide funding and support any proposals for improvements at Manchester Piccadilly station.
